messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/03 6:54:38 PM Pacific Daylight Time, jmcseals@msn.com ... ROFLMAO, I had just asked my DH if he could remember the name of the WWII
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/03 6:54:38 PM Pacific Daylight Time, jmcseals@...
writes:

> Probably not a good thing to relay to the hubby who knows him, but I
> googled
> Kyle Chandler to see what he looks like and ROFL!!!! I'm sorry, but for
> some reason he looks like a buffed up Mr. Bean! LOL! Maybe it was the
> picture or something but oh man, I'm about to pee my pants!
>
> Can you imagine DOING Mr. Bean???
>
> HAhahahahaha!
>
> Ouch, it hurts....
>
> Jennifer
>

ROFLMAO, I had just asked my DH if he could remember the name of the WWII
series, I said Home Front and he agreed, so when I saw Treegoddess had known it I
was glad and wondered what you thought Jennifer. Then when I found this post
I was choking with laughter. My mom is here and wants to know what's so funny.
I don't know if I want to google him or not, because if the pic is as bad as
making him look like Mr. Bean, I will surely wet my pants. And since I go back
into the hospital tomorrow, which is why my mommy is here, that will just be
too much amunition for her to give the doctor....not only is Rhonda sick with
yada, yada, yada, but now she pees her pants while on the internet.LMAO

Rhonda - desparately trying to not soil herself.LOL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler
messages.msgSnippet: Probably not a good thing to relay to the hubby who knows him, but I googled Kyle Chandler to see what he looks like and ROFL!!!!  I m sorry, but for some
messages.messageBody:
Probably not a good thing to relay to the hubby who knows him, but I googled
Kyle Chandler to see what he looks like and ROFL!!!! I'm sorry, but for
some reason he looks like a buffed up Mr. Bean! LOL! Maybe it was the
picture or something but oh man, I'm about to pee my pants!

Can you imagine DOING Mr. Bean???

HAhahahahaha!

Ouch, it hurts....

Jennifer
